mdRecord.dcterms:title: Engineering School - Graduate Division
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt: Studying pulse circuit techniques in the Electronics Engineering laboratory at the University of Virginia are, seated left to right, Carl A. Butler of Orange,VA; Joseph D. Pate, of Suffolk, VA; Richard Van Wagoner, McLean, VA; and Dewey Clower, Salem, VA, standing. All are fourth year men in engineering and, though Christmas holiday began Thursday, December 19, will be doing electrical research right up to Christmas day.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
